name: Detritus Decomposition Rate
functionStatement: Organic matter is captured and broken down, fueling food webs, balancing production/ respiration, moderating pH/ redox, and supplying nutrients.
descriptionMarkdown: Visible fungal colonization/shredding indicates a healthy detrital cycle.

levels.label: Strongly Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: No noticeable mass loss. Strong odor or anoxic conditions. No shredders in a reach where they are expected
Criteria: Very slow breakdown and absence of shredder taxa in suitable habitat

levels.label: Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Little change to leaf material after several weeks. Packs often coated in silt. Assemblage mostly tolerant collectors and grazers
Criteria: Slow breakdown with few or no active shredders

levels.label: Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Moderate softening of leaves with some fungal growth. One or two shredder groups present at low abundance
Criteria: Intermediate breakdown with partial shredder presence

levels.label: Strongly Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Leaf packs break down quickly with softening and visible fungal growth. Kick sample includes several shredder taxa
Criteria: Fast breakdown with strong biological processing and multiple shredder groups present
